pullRequest.title: XRDDEV-937, XRDDEV-938, XRDDEV-939, XRDDEV-940 - API key management frontend implementation
pullRequest.bodyText:
This pull request contains all the front end tickets related to API key management on the frontend:

https://jira.niis.org/browse/XRDDEV-937 (list)
https://jira.niis.org/browse/XRDDEV-938 (revoke)
https://jira.niis.org/browse/XRDDEV-939 (create)
https://jira.niis.org/browse/XRDDEV-940 (edit)

There is also a change to the SimpleDialog component to allow custom titles.

commit.message: XRDDEV-937: styling changes and update to the API call
XRDDEV-939: api key creation front end implementation
XRDDEV-938: revoke api key front end implementation
XRDDEV-940: edit api key front end implementation
